sections.name: Verse 1
sections.lyrics:
When the day is dawning
And the birds are singing...

sections.name: Chorus
sections.lyrics:
Oh, the sun is shining bright
Filling everything with light!

sections.name: Verse 2
sections.lyrics:
Through the fields we wander
Beneath the sky so blue...

sections.name: Bridge
sections.lyrics:
A moment of reflection
A peaceful, quiet view.

sections.name: Outro
sections.lyrics:
Fading light now calls us home
Until we meet again.
